ygData.subject: RE: New patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: If you all check out the date when the patch was apply it will tell you  the patch was apply on 8/19/99 not yesterday. Syren Wind - The bard of CoN - The Rathe
ygData.messageBody:
If you all check out the date when the patch was apply it will tell you the
patch was apply on 8/19/99 not yesterday.

Syren Wind - The bard of CoN - The Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) [mailto:kblair@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 1:07 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New patch message


From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>

> Well I spoke with a GM regarding this and he informed me
> that the patch message was in error. It documents changes
> that will be in the *next* release.

Someone mentioned (on this list?) a feature possibly being
added that sends a tell to your friends list.. The feature
would be used by doing a "/ftell <message>" - interesting
note that you can do this now, but your friends don't
actually get a message. Gives you a response of "You tell
your friends <message>".
